website_summaries.verdict: A new look for the Puma Basket shoe is presented in the form of the Puma Basket Platform Patent. The shoe is released in the women’s line of the brand. Its rubber outsole designed with a criss-cross pattern gives off an additional traction. Its lightly cushioned insole helps provide comfort for the foot. The reasonable price makes it a solid choice for many.
pros: The Puma Basket Platform Patent, according to most reviewers, feels comfortable for the foot
Some buyers said that the shoe is stylish
A lot of the reviewers are highly-appreciative of the colorways of the sneaker
A variety of colorways is available to choose from
The chunky sole is quite durable, according to a handful of reviewers
A few were happy that the Basket Platform Patent concept gave them a few inches of height
It goes with a variety of outfits, said some
cons: A couple of reviewers said that the shoe is a bit wide for the foot
One reviewer said that the shoe is a bit stiff that caused blisters on the foot
A reviewer claimed about the shoe being too small
The Basket Platform Patent from Puma's sneakers lineup is a bit heavy

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Nearly four months later and the sole has unglued. Definitely were my favorite sneakers though!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: If you like platform sneakers and have a wide foot, these are the shoes for you. I have another pair in black, so I knew what to expect as far as sizing and feel when I ordered them. I purchased the white leather with gum sole this time. The price that I paid made this purchase an excellent value. I paid about 78% less than I would have buying them in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big Puma fan I bought these and instantly loved them, they are so cute & fit nicely Update: almost a year later and these are still my favorite shoes I wear them a lot but I put insoles in them because the bottoms are a bit hard
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Westry

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these because I just couldn't seem to make them work with any of my clothes. That's fine. I tend to live in Vans and Converse, but I have a pair of Fenty X Puma creepers that I LOVE so I thought I'd give these a try. Just not my style. Super comfy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I got this after debating whether to order another type of Puma sneakers. I made the right choice. I love them. They are comfortable, true to size and very nice. I’m size 6 but with sneakers due to the fact that I wear socks, I order one size up. They fit perfectly. They are also made of leather and a slight platform which makes them more comfortable. I order the black ones and love that the heel is kind of beige. They go with jeans and dress pants as well. It’s a beautiful combination. I’m traveling soon and will probably take them with me as my major shoes for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I normally go for bright colors, but I really like these and the hint of silver in the ocean wave pattern. Even my kids would like to steal them from me. I wish the platform was a bit higher (like the Converse One Star plats), but I still prefer the overall look of the Puma because the toe box is more rounded. I've read a few sites that say these run a half size large. I usually wear between a 9.5-10...got these in a 9.5...and while a bit loose, there's no way I'd be able to comfortably wear a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Chickie

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are stylish & comfortable. I even got them a half size smaller (that’s not my recommendation for you I’m losing weight so...) I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kita

customer_reviews.title: Puma Addict
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I love the color and shine and the different beige sole. I own multiple pairs of Pumas and never have a bad thing to say about any of them. I always get comments on my Pumas no matter the style. Keep up the good work, Puma! If you want someone to try-out new models, send some my way!
customer_reviews.author: K Roz

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I thought these shoes looked really cool. That why I got them in two different colors. They are very comfortable as well. I don’t even feel like I am walking on platform shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Catrease

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Chic, and Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these Pumas, they are comfy, sturdy and fashionable. I work at Lowe’s so I’m on concrete ALL DAY. On top of that, I have peripheral neuropathy in both feet and legs so I’m usually in LOTS of PAIN. These Pumas are a God sent and I no longer have to wear my orthotics because my feet feel so much better lately. THANK YOU, PUMA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoen
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe to wear around town and with casual outfits. They’re super comfortable and love wearing them. Only thing is the shoe laces are a bit stiff and short.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Puma lover vs product fail
customer_reviews.text: I love Puma’s. I wore these 4x before this happened. Very disappointed, as I know Puma to be a high standard shoe maker and company. What can be done?
customer_reviews.author: sy

customer_reviews.title: Puma all day :)
customer_reviews.text: Puma never lets me down with their sneakers, and now that I own four pairs of just Pumas, I think it's safe to say that they're my go-to brand :) These are so soft and comfy! I use a rain and stain protectant for all of my sneakers, and these are my first pair of white shoes in a very long time, so they are good to go. It didn't take long for them to break in. I love the gum soles!
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: These are freaking cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking and looking and looking and looking for a white sneaker. These are so cute and comfy! If anything, they might run a little big; I usually wear 6.5 or 7. I ordered a 7 and they are great! Love the white with the gum sole. Love that they are leather and wipeable.
customer_reviews.author: danni

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, functional Fashion sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I love puma fashion sneakers all the way and own several pairs in this very same brand and each one of them are a great fit, so pretty! This particular pair here was on a super good sale price when I got them recently & the color is so gorgeous it is a very lovely pale mint color combined with a silver touch super adorable! I’m very happy with my purchase five stars and more!
customer_reviews.author: Dazzling Diamonds

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great soft leather. Were able to guess the size and happy with it but be aware of amazon’s conversion as it shows 25.4 cm for 9.5 size which is actually 26 cm.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Has a smell but I’m sure it’ll dissipate
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers have a very odd smell— but they look sick. I love the thick brown soles. Update: The problem is the sole completely detached from the shoe less than two months after buying. Puma won’t replace them and amazon’s return policy doesn’t cover it. If you want them for a few weeks get them— but if you want longevity this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in May, and it now July. My wife uses it to walk nothing else, and as you can see the sole is coming off. Not sure if these are fugazi but total trash! Don't wast your doe!
customer_reviews.author: TReNo

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Not a big fan of platform sneaks but these easily supported 6+ miles/day on cobbled European streets, somewhat fashionable and comfy. A bit heavier than what i prefer yet the rubber soles make up for it. Buy them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Scott Justus

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy n cute and is true to size... a teeny bit heavy but nothing to write home about. I got mine at a VERY reasonable price so I'd definitely buy again (different color) - at that same price!
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Pumalicious Pink! Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I love pink and took a chance on these. Fit as expected and seems to be really comfortable can’t wait to try them out. Cute!
customer_reviews.author: KindleVet

customer_reviews.title: Real Leather
customer_reviews.text: I already own a pair of these in black suede. Comfortable and have worked out for me so far. Plan to wear these as part of my summer staples wardrobe.(white ones).
customer_reviews.author: weaswoman

customer_reviews.title: Such a steal to pass up
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! The fit is quite perfect even with it being a half size larger than my usual size. Goes great with practically everything- skirts, pants, dresses. 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Jaywill Sands

customer_reviews.title: Nauseating stink lasting for days
customer_reviews.text: Could not bring myself to even try these on when they arrived - the sneakers have nauseating chemical odor, very potent and enduring. Kept them outside to outgas for several DAYS. They were still smelly after that, but the fit seems fine, so does the look. Attempted to contact PUMA, and received automated impersonal reply that completely ignored my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Siberian

customer_reviews.title: Upper boot ripped away from the sole within 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: They're as cute as they look, and I love the platform, but overall the shoes are very low quality. The upper split away from the sole within one month of me starting to wear them... Check out the photos to see. Have not put them through any abnormal wear and tear. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable on my feet
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice I really like them helps with walking they not all flat to the ground if you like comfortable these are the ones
customer_reviews.author: Lilmoes

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and have recieved many compliments! Also, being 5'1...these add a little height♡ They look just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: LeahRR

customer_reviews.title: Good price worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, definitely was skeptical about the price figured I was getting what I paid for but no really nice shoe definitely recommend purchasing it and also insoles for the shoe if wearer is gonna wear them causally.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Harth

customer_reviews.title: Becareful
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit right it was just about a week after my girlfriend wearing them the bottom part of the shoe started to come apart
customer_reviews.author: Louie dewie

customer_reviews.title: Good width
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Love the sole. Super comfy even with my impossible bunions. Went up half size and had no break in period. Straight out of the box they’ve been great.
customer_reviews.author: Lara S.

customer_reviews.title: Lookin fly and great price
customer_reviews.text: These are hot and I got them for a great sale price. You can’t really go wrong W / old school Pumas. There isn’t a lot of arch support and the uppers are stiff, more of a street shoe than a gym shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute - order half size down
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of the shoe (the thick platform) and the silver detail is so unique! I am usually an 8.5 but ordered an 8 based on other reviews and the 8 fits.
customer_reviews.author: cp.

customer_reviews.title: Rust small
customer_reviews.text: Should have ordered 1/2 size larger. They are leather so maybe they will stretch. They will be tight with socks.
customer_reviews.author: Mcarter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product. My wife loved it and they look so perfect and comfortable... very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JohannQ

customer_reviews.title: Forget Nike Air Force 1
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when the Nike Air Force 1s were all the rage and honestly they are so much cuter. The platforms, however, are starting to come apart from the white part of the shoe but I'm sure it's easy to glue back.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Rothman

customer_reviews.title: too big and too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Run 1/2 size too large. Also, they are pretty heavy and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Europe

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and comfy. Not an orthotic type insole, but very cushiony. You could easily add one. The leather is soft and buttery and I LOVE that the tongue isn’t longer than the shoe top. Very flattering and stays neat.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but the fit is to small
customer_reviews.text: Mad because they are to small and I went up a size and still a size to small
customer_reviews.author: Incognito72

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! They will come in handy for spring clothing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Based on a previous order I decided to keep the same size (7.5) but it’s a little bit large I usually use size 7
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun sneakers to dress up or down wardrobe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I thought great for a sporty twist with work slacks and summery dresses! The fit perfect support not as much, but I bought them specifically for short walks and casual activities for work and off work. Love the rose gold accents and the tread on soles awesome grip as I am very clumsy!
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, can't beat the price and they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Mohney

customer_reviews.title: Good for dresses and jeans
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, I wear with dresses, Jean's, shorts, leggings. just perfect! Have those in 2 colors will get more for more outfits
customer_reviews.author: YuliaBoldyreva

customer_reviews.title: The perfect😊💓
customer_reviews.text: They're really nice, the the shoelace feel so cheap but they're still good😊💓, the color is beautiful, it shipped the next day after I order them😍
customer_reviews.author: Nyla

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like these tennis shoes. They give added height and can wear all day in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Defective pair☹
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to separation of sole from body of shoe at toe box area.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Better packaging and to big
customer_reviews.text: It's not fitting it's actually to big, and the package came damaged
customer_reviews.author: Uttara

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Really like these. Comfortable and I get compliments on their looks.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Mack

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are just like in the pictures provided. Super cute, I wear them all the time & they're comfortable to walk in and stand . The 7.5 was a big bigger than I had expected, but the shoes are a bit narrow as well . They do seem to scuff up kinda easily
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I keep on buying these!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of these shoes. I love them. Perfect height comfy and goes well with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love them for the price, I have wide feet my regular size worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My go to sneaker for running errands or if I want to do a casual chic look
customer_reviews.author: Kodiva86

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. I like so much and fit perfect. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ana de la Plaza

customer_reviews.title: Funny odor
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes as pictured in the photos. They are great. I gave them 4 stars because they have a "musty" smell, as though they have been stored in a damp basement. I'm hoping it wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Bellasmom

customer_reviews.title: super!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes and they are getting more comfortable the more I wear them. I feel like the toe box is a bit wide which I love because my toes can stretch. They fit me well, I have a long skinny paw
customer_reviews.author: amy sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Gift Item
customer_reviews.text: This item is a gift for my daughter. Item was received quickly and is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Chester A. King III

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, but...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe with a smooth soft look but I didnt like that I could see that where I bend my toe it would develop a crease and look ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Used, with scuff marks
customer_reviews.text: My shoes came in the mail with the shoes already creased, dirty soles, and scuff marks all over. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Romero

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I wans not expectin to be this nice. the shoes fit great and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: eldi m.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Would buy again shoes fit good and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Brister

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute and fit well but they are sneakers; they should be comfortable to walk around in. My feet always hurt 30 minutes into wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Order correct size
customer_reviews.text: So, when I ordered I ordered a half size up, so now it’s a little roomy in the toe. So definitely get your correct size. Unless you like roomy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Omni Hankerson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers, they are super cute! Puma’s always run a little small for me, so I recommend going up a half size. I usually wear a 7.5 but I ordered these in an 8 and they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size because comment said they run small ...not true.I added arch support now they're perfect. And lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Pamela W.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for any occasion!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! I have long narrow feet, but these are great! Super trendy and versatile :)
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.text: Once I ordered shoe for me and it fits more than I buy myself in shops 🙈🙈🙈🙈 Best quality best seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: The edge trim split from the shoe body
customer_reviews.text: The edge trim seperated from the main body of the shoe during my first wear. I work in a non strenuous, small store enviroment. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable a must buy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the overall feel of the shoe. I got the blue one and i would say its a comfortable high quality shoe but personally for me its kinda hard to match with fits. I would have prefered white or black but the blue is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather shoe but don't love the strong rubber smell.
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with the style and comfort of the shoe. The only down side is the strong rubber smell it has. I'm hoping it will go away with time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable and stylish. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing PUMAs for years. i have never seen such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful and It can make me looks higher
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: I adore these I wear them all the time! Love the colors too they never look dirty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Pumas. Comfortable, fit as expected and timely shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit and great look!
customer_reviews.text: I have the rose gold and the black ones I love them both!
customer_reviews.author: jessica mccain

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS SHOE
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments! I love this comfortable shoe-- will def be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for wearing around town and to work. Comfy and cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathlete

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fit perfect, great value!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cute! My job just switched our uniforms to more casual but the caveat being that we have to wear Pumas or Supergas. So I bought 3 pairs after my first suede pair got ruined in a rainstorm. These are leather so I feel like I am safer wearing them and they have the very grippy gumsole, so much better for bartending in general. These fit well, I feel like breaking them in will be really easy and the color is so pretty in person. The sole is almost a small platform just in case that would deter anyone. I highly recommend, especially at 24 dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Makara Berry

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Basket Platform Patent Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: The basket platform is inspired by the grunge fashion movement of the 1990s. With its high outsole combined with a suede upper, the basket platform is a collaboration between two iconic movements in the sneaker and footwear industry. The patent offers a sleek finish that goes with any outfit
